work.summary: Care for the well-being of patients within the scope of my certification. Ensure Olive's A.R.C.H., LLC, effectively communicates and delivers its commitments to the community it serves.
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official paperwork
Care for patients every day basic needs

volunteer.organization: Resurrection of the Lord Catholic Church
volunteer.summary: Lead fellow Altar Servers and volunteers through their duties before, during, and after mass.
highlights: Ensure the stability of the flow of mass while maintaining the safety and security of parishoners
Organize and host scheduled mass and special events

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
